n: Overnight Coconut Pecan Steel Cut Oats
des: "No-cook method of preparing steel cut oats. Soaking overnight makes for a chewy and hearty wholesome breakfast or snack that is ready when you are to eat."
ins: Mix oats, coconut, pecans, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a small container; top with 1/3 cup milk. Cover and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Stir 1 tablespoon milk  into oat mixture before serving.
